name: GoDrunk
description:
GoDrunk or go home in this thrilling tale of a man who has too much to drink and religiously believes in superstitions

ESRB M

Recommended to ages 17+ due to the violent amount of blood that emits out of the body when the character dies

HOW TO PLAY ON A PC

You navigate using the WASD keys to walk forwards (W), backwards (S), and rotate the camera left (A) and right (D). You jump using the spacebar.

Jump over the cracks on the sidewalk (the black things) to avoid dying a brutal and gruesome death.

Shameless plug

I built this game on stream. You can follow me and watch me have fun building games on twitch.tv/zerozipzilch

Please report any bugs, issues or requests down below and I'll have a look at it!
